const char * CMLHelper::GetCPPClassName ( const char *  pszMuthurClassName  )  [static]

Summary: Called to get the C++ class name that is associated with the specified Muthur class name

Parameters:

  • pszMuthurClassName - the Muthur class name

Returns: the associated C++ class name if there is one

Returns: the associated Muthur class name if there is one

Summary: Called to get the Muthur class name that is associated with the specified typeid C++ class name (i.e. returned from typeid(OBJECT).name())

Parameters:

  • pszCPPClassName - the C++ class name

Returns: the associated Muthur class name if there is one

CMLPropMember * CMLHelper::GetPropTree ( IMLSerialize *  pISerialize  )  [static]

Summary: Called to get the Muthurlib XML tree for the specified object

Parameters:

  • pISerialize - the object being serialized

Returns: the root element in the property tree

Remarks: The caller is responsible for deallocation of the return object

CMLPropMember * CMLHelper::GetPropTree ( char *  pXmlStream  )  [static]

Summary: Called to get the Muthurlib XML tree from the specified XML stream

Parameters:

  • pXmlStream - the XML text stream
  • pMLTree - the root element of the MuthurLib XML tree

Returns: the root element in the property tree

Remarks: The caller is responsible for deallocation of the return object

bool CMLHelper::GetXmlStream ( CMLPropMember *  pMLPropTree,
CMLDataStream *  pStream 
) [static]

Summary: Called to get the XML stream used to represent property tree

Parameters:

  • pMLPropTree - the root of the MutherLib property tree
  • pStream - buffer to contain the XML stream

Returns: true if successful

bool CMLHelper::GetXmlStream ( IMLSerialize *  pISerialize,
CMLDataStream *  pStream 
) [static]

Summary: Called to get the XML stream used to represent the object

Parameters:

  • pISerialize - the object to be streamed
  • pStream - buffer to contain the XML stream

Returns: The buffer containing the XML stream

bool CMLHelper::LoadPropTree ( IMLSerialize *  pISerialize,
CMLPropMember *  pMLPropTree 
) [static]

Summary: Called to load the MutherLib property tree extracted from the serialized stream.

Parameters:

  • pISerialize - the object being serialized
  • pMLPropTree - the tree created from the XML stream

Returns: true if all nodes processed without error

bool CMLHelper::LoadXmlBlock ( IMLSerialize *  pISerialize,
EMLXMLBlock  eXmlBlock,
CMLPropMember *  pParent 
) [static]

Summary: Called to set the value of all class members in the specified block

Parameters:

  • pISerialize - the object being serialized
  • eXmlBlock - the enumerated block identifier
  • pParent - the element that contains the child values

Returns: true if all child elements are processed

bool CMLHelper::LoadXmlStream ( IMLSerialize *  pISerialize,
char *  pXmlStream 
) [static]

Summary: Called to set the value of all class members using the specified stream

Parameters:

  • pISerialize - the object being serialized
  • pXmlStream - the stream used to set the property values

Returns: true if successful

bool CMLHelper::SaveXmlStream ( IMLSerialize *  pISerialize,
char *  pszFileSpec 
) [static]

Summary: Called to save the XML stream used to represent the object

Parameters:

  • pISerialize - the object to be streamed
  • pszFileSpec - fully qualified path to the output file

Returns: The buffer containing the XML stream
